alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:55AM CDT until July 09 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR TISHOMINGO...EASTERN PRENTISS AND SOUTHEASTERN ALCORN COUNTIES... At 655 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burton, or 7 miles northwest of Tishomingo State Park, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Burton, Midway, Leedy, Paden, Oldham, Thrasher, Dennis, Blythe Crossing, Carter Branch, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Mingo and Holcut. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
